instructions_to_main_agent: OVERRIDE the existing 'primary' color in tailwind.config.js to #D4FF00 (Lime Green). The current #EBD5AB is deprecated for this redesign.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for all Headings. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all metadata (dates, times, labels).
Implement the 'Swiss Grid' strictly. Every component should feel like it is inside a grid cell with a visible border.
The 'Briefing Page' is the main dashboard. It should feel like a tactical operations screen.
Use the 'scanline' effect overlay on the main player area to give it a broadcast feel.
For the 'Historical Briefings', use a virtualized list if possible, or a clean scrollable area with sticky headers for months.
Ensure the Audio Player is persistent or very prominent. This is an AUDIO-FIRST app.
Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds. Apply 'mix-blend-mode: overlay' or 'opacity-20' to blend them into the dark theme.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, mostly for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
